title: Bear Blog
summary: A clean & simple personal web & blogging site.

title: plaintextsports.com
summary: A simple text-based site for sports scores.

title: The Fig Tree - Community Resources, Agencies and Ministries
summary: The Fig Tree Directory of local resources in Spokane, WA

title: Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS)
summary: A yearly survey that measures changes in the health of people in Washington state. Data can be requested through an online form.

title: Healthy Youth Survey
summary: A biennial survey of 6th - 12th graders that measures wellbeing in Washington state.

title: Washington Department of Health Data Topics A-Z
summary: A page with an alphabetized list of linked pages to health topics and related data.

title: County Health Insights
summary: A public health resource for counties in Eastern Washington that includes health indicators, dashboards, data briefs, and reports.
